vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2326 for an alcoholic beverage establishment limited to a bar, lounge, or tavern on property zoned Subdistrict 1 within Planned Development No. 621, the Old Trinity and Design District Special Purpose District, along the east line of Market Center Boulevard, south of Oak Lawn Avenue
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to amended conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to amended conditions
Z234-276(CR)
